TopicTitle: Unable to create new stage [dragging on '+' button doesnt create new stage]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: i7 13700K | GPU: 3080 | RAM: 32GB

 

While doing the rocket construction tutorial that introduces setting up staging, the player is instructed to create a new stage and to drag a decoupler to it.

After a few attempts I was able to successfully create a new stage (the + did nothing the first few times). I then dragged an engine from the first stage to stage 3, and was unable to drag it back down (could only reorder it within stage 3). I was also unable to move the booster coupling from stage 3 to stage 2 as the tutorial instructed me to. I was able to move both the engine and coupling upwards (to later stages), but was unable to move them downwards (to earlier stages).
